description.p: This spear was crafted in a land far from here, having fallen through the Omniverse to end up in these lands.
Dormant. The Artillerist's Spear grants the following benefits in its dormant state:

ul.li: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls when wielding this weapon.
When thrown, the item reappears in the hands of the weilder attuned to it. A copy of the spear head remains lodged where the spear landed.
As a bonus action, slamming the butt of the spear into the ground results in the copies of the spearhead to explode dealing 2d6 force damage.

description.p: Awakened. When the Artillerist's Spear reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

ul.li: The weapon’s bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2.
The damage from the exploding spearheads increases to 3d6.
When throwing the spear, you can speak the command word to cast Conjure Barrage. If a target succeeds on the Dex throw to avoid the spear, they are not stuck with a spearhead.

description.p: Exalted. When the Artillerist's Spear reaches an exalted state, it gains the following properties:

ul.li: The weapon’s bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +3.
The damage from the exploding spearheads increases to 4d6.
If an enemy has has a tie to a certain amount of element, you can use a bonus action to stab the enemy and absorb the elemental type into the spear.
The spear gains an extra d6 of elemental damage for one minute once this is used. This damage ignores resistance and immunity to the type of damage being induced.
